message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm taking a risk by letting this go to another round - 550k is my final offer.
You took a risk, now it's my turn. Take the 30% before it's too late!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'll take the original 40% before we both lose even more to inflation. This is my last offer.
